- Trust signals (AggregateRating)
- System fonts only (no external deps)
- 15KB total size
- LCP < 2.5s on 3G

- Root README.md with quick start
- docs/templates/README.md with usage guide
- docs/templates/refactor-plan.md with technical details
- docs/templates/boilerplate-2026.html production template
